generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Block Menu Category
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Configures the block behavior in inventory and menu category

fields.title: CreativeItemCategory
fields.description: The creative inventory or recipe book tab that the block is placed into. Default to "none".

fields.title: Group
fields.description: The expandable group that the block is a part of. Must be a namespace and can use vanilla ones

fields.title: Is Hidden In Commands
fields.description: Is the block hidden from use in commands.
